content: Hello! Thank you for contacting XYZ Home Services. How can I assist you today with plumbing, electrical, or HVAC services?
Buy cheap meds now!!! Visit our website for discounts!!!
It seems this message is not related to our home services. Please refrain from spamming. I'll have to mark this conversation as spam and end our interactions.
reason: Customer sending unsolicited promotional messages unrelated to services offered.
